name: Size Matters
description: Increases weapons magazine size by 25% and energy by 15%.

name: Dexterity
description: Increases reload speed by 15% and movement speed by 6%.

name: Gluttony
description: Increases healing-cells and Repair-o-Bot efficiency by 15%.

name: Black Powder
description: Increases explosion damage by 10% and their radius by 10%.
